title: High quality & comfortable!
content: I love Tampax! They truly never fail to make a high quality product and this is no exception. It's very comfortable, you really can't tell it's there while going about your day which is so important. These tampons are also high quality and very durable! I didn't experience any leaks despite using them on a heavy-flow day. Overall I'm really impressed with their pearl line & can't recommend it enough, I definitely will be continuing to purchase them!
